title: Germany bars unvaccinated from much of public life
content: Chancellor Angela Merkel describes the far-reaching measures as an act of "national solidarity".

title: Germany bars unvaccinated from much of public life
content: Chancellor Angela Merkel describes the far-reaching measures as an act of "national solidarity".

title: Shock over verdict in judo champion’s assault case
content: Margaux Pinot accuses her partner of domestic abuse, but a court acquits him, citing lack of proof.

title: Omicron drives major surge in S Africa Covid cases
content: The new Omicron variant has now become dominant, the country's top medical scientists say.

title: Russia warns of military confrontation nightmare
content: Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov floats the idea of a new European security pact to prevent Nato expansion.

title: US and Mexico to restart 'Remain in Mexico' policy
content: More than 60,000 asylum seekers have been sent back to Mexico under the controversial programme.

title: Ex-Afghan president: The Taliban are my brothers
content: In a BBC interview, Hamid Karzai also calls on the international community to help rebuild Afghanistan.

title: Elle to stop promoting animal fur in its magazines
content: It is the first major fashion publication to make the pledge, citing its support for animal rights.
